name: Myopia (jfaulkner)
description:
Game Summary
EDM driven rhythm game featuring songs created by hot local EDM artist
Compatible with Xbox controllers and Dance mat peripherals.

Testimonies
"Beat Saber but for the [poor]"  ~  Steve Halliwell

Credits
Programming by Jay Faulkner and Ben Drury
Audio SFX by Jackson Mayberry
Music by Kai Chu
